troubleshooting.title: mySWS is not opening
troubleshooting.shortdesc: mySWS is not opening or not appearing properly

condition.title: Condition
condition.p: A blank page or error message is appearing instead of the mySWS site.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: You may be using an unsupported browser, such as Internet Explorer.

step.cmd: Use Safari or Google Chrome instead.
step.info: mySWS works best with Google Chrome. If you do not have the Google Chrome browser, you can download it.
